name: Redmatch 2 (itch)
description:
This is a very early version of the sequel to Redmatch! In Redmatch 2, I am rebuilding all the things that made Redmatch great and improving them as well as optimizing gameplay and ironing out bugs. You can expect a much smoother and reliable experience than the original Redmatch :)

This game is still in alpha phases, so expect some bugs. You can provide feedback or meet up with friends to play on our discord server!
